title: Dreams (CRE201)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the first episode from our second season, Kurt Braunohler, Joe Mande, Alessandro Minoli, Danielle Cook and Kevin Allison share stories where figments of the unreal realm took the steering wheel. The second season of the podcast is off to a surreal start.
Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kurt Braunohler, Danielle Cooks, Joe Mande, Alessandro Minoli, Love Lake, Xela, Daniel Veesey, Norwegian Recycling, Los Amigos Invisibles, Skybox, Shawn Lee's Ping Pong Orchestra, Andy Kroner, Shawn Lee, Kevin Allison)
